revolutionary.title: Revolutionary Approach
revolutionary.description: Unlike traditional laser treatments, Saesal works with your body's natural healing system to safely and effectively remove tattoo ink from all colors and types.

natural.title: Natural & Safe
natural.description: Our solution uses only natural and organic materials that are already components of the human body, ensuring maximum safety and effectiveness.

fast.title: Fast Results
fast.description: Complete tattoo removal in just 4 sessions, compared to 10+ sessions required by traditional laser treatments.

comparison.title: Laser vs Saesal
comparison.subtitle: See the difference between traditional laser treatment and our innovative Saesal method

laser.title: Limitations of Laser Treatment
laser.summary: 10+ Sessions Required • Painful Process • Limited Colors

colorLimitation.title: Color Limitation
colorLimitation.description: Laser only works on dark colors. Warm and bright (Red, Yellow, Green) color removal is big limitation.

painful.title: Painful Process
painful.description: Technically Laser treatment is burning skin which is most painful issue of humans body. Also it causes burn scars.

longProcess.title: Long Process
longProcess.description: It takes more then 10 sessions to completely remove tattoo. If it's color tattoo, it takes more sessions.

aftercare.title: Difficult Aftercare
aftercare.description: Laser treatment left blister. It's needs more difficult aftercare.

saesal.title: What about 'Saesal'?
saesal.summary: Only 4 Sessions • Less Pain • All Colors Supported

allColors.title: All Colors
allColors.description: 'Saesal' works every single colors. Also it works on Cosmetic Tattoo.

safe.title: Safe Process
safe.description: It's not Laser Removal. 'Saesal' Treatment is same as Tattooing. (To apply, using tattoo needle)

fast.title: Fast Results
fast.description: 'Saesal' Treatment only takes 4 sessions to completely remove inks. If it's simple line tattoo, it takes only 2 sessions.

easycare.title: Easy Aftercare
easycare.description: 'Saesal' treatment only left scabs, like tattoo. And aftercare is also like tattoo.

step1.title: Ink Particles Under Skin
step1.description: Large tattoo ink particles embedded in skin layers

step2.title: Laser Breaks Particles
step2.description: High-energy laser breaks ink into smaller fragments

step3.title: Bloodstream Transport
step3.description: Particles travel through bloodstream to organs

laser.warning1: Laser treatment slowly fades but remains visible during sessions
laser.warning2: Requires 10+ sessions and may cause burn scars
laser.warning3: Unknown effects of ink particles accumulating in organs

step2.title: Natural Scab Formation
step2.description: Body forms protective scab containing ink

step3.title: Natural Ink Removal
step3.description: Ink exits naturally with scab after 2 weeks

saesal.benefit1: Works on every single color including cosmetic tattoos
saesal.benefit2: Visible results in just one session - no burn scars

step1.title: Right After Scabs Fall Off
step1.description: Skin looks pink - this is completely normal during the natural healing process

step2.title: 10-12 Weeks Later
step2.description: Skin fully heals and becomes ready for the next treatment session

safety.bodyComponentsDescription: Contains the same compounds naturally present in healthy human tissue
